title: Pumpkin cider cake
description: The classic flavour of pumpkin pie is magically translated into cake form. Add cider and you're on to a winner. For this recipe you will need a small bundt tin 21cm/8¼in in diameter. The key to making this look like a pumpkin is to use a tin with vertical segments, not with a twist.
ingredients: 1 small pumpkin or squash (such as onion, crown prince and kabocha)
200g/7oz full fat cream cheese, at room temperature
